title: Sicilian Quarry Worker
provenance_text:
Renato Guttuso [1912-1987]; Edward Azen, Abbey Art Galleries, Pittsburgh, PA [1]. Elizabeth C. Evans (Mrs. John E. Evans, Jr.), Pittsburgh, PA, by November 1984 until October 1991; her gift to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1991 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 328 (illustrated, plate 68) in the "Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Paintings" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October-December 1950. It was purchased from the exhibition by Edward Azen, Abbey Art Galleries, Pittsburgh, PA, for $150.
[2]. The painting was delivered to the museum on July 18, 1991; it was accessioned on October 3, 1991.
